hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select concat(101, testRunResultStatusId) id, testRunResultStatusId categoryName, count(*) categoryValue from TestRunResult where (testRunId = :testRunId or -1 = :testRunId) and (testCycleId = :testCycleId or -1 = :testCycleId) and (testSuiteId = :testSuiteId or -1 = :testSuiteId) group by testRunResultStatusId
